value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Look alive, everyone! We have an
emergency on our hands. Princess
Veronica's forces are invading!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|Again? Such nerve, that one! Which
world is it this time?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Ours! Her forces are invading
Askr! They've broken through the
border, and they're close by.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|You're joking, right? When did she
even find the time to ensnare any
more Heroes?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|We don't know. Though the Order of
Heroes has been doing its best to
keep an eye on her...we failed.$k$pThat's not the worst of it, I'm afraid.
The Hero she's contracted is said
to be the strongest in all the worlds...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|The strongest of the Heroes? You
can't mean...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|I'm afraid I do. You may know him as
the Radiant Hero... I'm talking about
Ike.$k$p

$WmMPID_アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Normal,Face|$w0|So this is the Order of Heroes.
You don't seem much like the
royal armies I've fought before.$k$pThe Greil Mercenaries are bound by
our contract with Princess Veronica.
We finish what we start.$k$pIf you don't have the courage for a
fight, you'd better run.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Listen up, everyone. There's no need
to defeat them now.$k$pJust stay safe and make it through
the battle.$k$pDo what you can to use up time, and
don't try anything reckless!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Well, I guess that's it. Ike, let's
regroup for now.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I've shared our ward with you...but
its protection won't last forever.$k$pRetreat for now. Soon enough its
power will return, and then we'll strike
again.$k$pAnd again. And again. Over and
over. No matter how long it takes.$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|We managed to fend them off...
for now.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Barely! That Ike...the Radiant Hero...
Is it me, or is he WAY too strong?
So much so that it's just not fair!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|I can't argue. His skills speak to a life
spent training for battle, and no one
can match his tenacity... Can we win?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Hey! Don't give up just yet!
Things may look dark right now, but
that battle did teach us something.$k$p$EFace|Right, $Nu?
Even though they had a huge
advantage, our opponents fled.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You're right! Had the battle continued,
they would have won. There has to
be a reason for it... Do you think—$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Yes. Whatever power it is they have
protecting them, it doesn't last very
long.$k$p$EFace|I'm sure they'll attack again. We'd
better get ready.$k$p$Sbs150|
